text: is a railway station in Shinjuku and Shibuya wards in Tokyo, Japan. According to the Guinness Book of Records, it is the busiest train station in the world. ==Adjacent stations== ==Other websites== * JR East Shinjuku Station ** * Keio Shinjuku Station ** * Odakyu Shinjuku Station * Tokyo Metro Shinkuku Station * Toei Shinjuku Station ==References== Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Shinjuku Station
